meanings.definition: The practice or skill of archery.
meanings.sent1: Her toxophily improved after many hours of practice at the archery range.
meanings.sent2: His toxophily was evident in the way he carefully selected his bow and arrows.
meanings.sent3: The toxophily of the young archer was so strong that he even dreamt of hitting bullseyes.
meanings.sent4: Her toxophily was like a steady hand guiding her through the challenges of life.
meanings.sent5: The toxophily of the ancient warriors was legendary, with tales of their precise aim echoing through history.

meanings.definition: The love or enthusiasm for archery.
meanings.sent1: Their toxophily for the sport led them to join the local archery club.
meanings.sent2: The community's toxophily was evident during the annual archery competition.
meanings.sent3: His toxophily was so strong that he even named his pet cat 'Arrow'.
meanings.sent4: The toxophily of the fans was like a wave of support for the archery team.
meanings.sent5: The young girl's toxophily shone brightly as she cheered on her favorite archer.
